DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study seek evaluate feasibility measure proximal effect concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( CRT ) expression potential therapeutic target molecule Head Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma ( HNSCC ) . Specifically , study proposes evaluate extent CRT induce differential expression component along two critical , potentially interdependent , molecular pathway : arachidonic acid epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) signal pathway .
DOC.brief_title: Proximal Molecular Effects Concurrent Chemoradiotherapy Head Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Untreated HNSCC ( > Stage I ) amenable transoral biopsy . Scheduled concurrent CRT ( Cisplatin Carboplatin/5FU base ) definitive primary treatment Older 18 year age . Understand sign inform consent . Any prior treatment index cancer ( chemotherapy , immunotherapy , hormonal therapy radiation therapy ) similar treatment unrelated malignancy within 6 week enrollment study . Breastfeeding , pregnancy childbearing potential ( include woman less two year post menopausal ) unable confirm adequate contraception ( abstinence , IUD , birth control pill , spermicidal gel diaphragm condom ) since last menses . History chronic inflammatory disease ( e.g . ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease , rheumatoid arthritis pancreatitis ) . Corticosteroid use within 6 week enrollment , exclude topical nasal spray . NSAID ( include celecoxib ) aspirin ( > 81 mg/day ) use within 1 week enrollment . Investigational medication use within 6 week enrollment schedule receive investigational drug course study .
